body:
Day 10 - Manga 185*
Really good. The way that they killed Sasuke and Naruto is not given, unfortunately, but they have fun and kill the girl in the end to get rid of evidence.
The art is kinda rough but good nevertheless.
Now I want to see the continuation.
8/10.
Well at least the facial expressions were good.
On one hand, rape, on the other, Sakura  ehhh 4/10

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me (i accidentally read this comment, so sorry)

if you are reading this then every person in this comment section who curses you or someone you know, will die in 5 days after you read this.
you can undo it by replying "May lightning hit you" to the person who curses you
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
